parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: To be zealous, strive eagerly, desire very strongly.
From the same as hesuchios; to keep still, i.e. Refrain from labor, meddlesomeness or speech.
To do, perform, accomplish; be in any condition, i.e. I fare; I exact, require.
Pertaining to self, i.e. One's own; by implication, private or separate.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: To work, trade, perform, do, practice, commit, acquire by labor.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Pertaining to self, i.e. One's own; by implication, private or separate.
According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To notify, command, charge, entreat solemnly. From para and the base of aggelos; to transmit a message, i.e. to enjoin.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
